directions: Mix cream cheese, parsley, lemon, and Greek seasoning together in a bowl; fold in salmon and artichoke hearts.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
1 (2.6 ounce) pouch skinless, boneless pink salmon
1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
title: Artichoke and Salmon Salad
